isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - BATTERY POWER DISTRIBUTION (WITHOUT 3+1 BATTERY SYSTEM)

svcproc.title: BATTERY POWER DISTRIBUTION (WITHOUT 3+1 BATTERY SYSTEM)
svcproc.para: With the ignition key switch in the off position, the batteries provide power to the (B1) and (B2) battery studs, through the 150 amp. megafuse. From the (B1) and (B2) battery studs power is distributed to selected electrical systems.
With 3+1 System, refer to 3+1 Battery System below.
